Package com.querydsl.sql.spring

Spring support

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SpringConnectionProvider
    SpringConnectionProvider is a Provider implementation which provides a transactionally bound connection
    SpringExceptionTranslator
    SpringExceptionTranslator is an SQLExceptionTranslator implementation which uses Spring's exception translation functionality internally
